subject: Assaults
Football (College)
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Philip Nelson transferred to the Scarlet Knights from Minnesota after the 2013 season, but was dismissed from the team after he was arrested over the weekend in connection with an assault.
snippet: Philip Nelson transferred to the Scarlet Knights from Minnesota after the 2013 season, but was dismissed from the team after he was arrested over the weekend in connection with an assault.
